title: Zaman Dabo
text:
Atak Nfang (<a href="Hausa%20language">Hausa:</a> Zaman Dabo) is a district and a village community in <a href="Zangon%20Kataf">Zangon Kataf Local Government Area</a>, <a href="Southern%20Kaduna">southern</a> <a href="Kaduna%20state">Kaduna state</a> in the <a href="Middle%20Belt">Middle Belt</a> region of <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>. The postal code for the area is 802142.
Settlements.
 The following are some major settlements in Atak Nfang (Zaman Dabo) district include:
Demographics.
The people of Atak Nfang (Zaman Dabo) district are majorly <a href="Atyap%20people">Atyap people</a>. Although settlers from other parts of the country are found in parts of the district.
